name: NieR:Cogito
storyline: You were a special Machine. You are capable of making Yes/No choices. Now, after an unknown amount of time, you are reconnected to the Machine Network to once again make decisions, the outcomes of which will shape the path your kind walks, so think very, very, very hard about your choices, if you can.
summary: This game is a non-commercial work, produced for the Nier:Re[in]carnation Content Creator Competition hosted by Square Enix on August 2021. It's an unofficial derivative game made in just 3 weeks about monsters and machines who think they are humans.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: NieR:Cogito -  Video Trailer For The Derivative Program About Machines
